## Tema 1

```{r simpleQuiz}
x <- 10
quiz(
  caption="Kviz",
  question("Kaj izmed nastetega ni povezano s programskim jezikom JavaScript?",
    answer("Learnr", correct = TRUE),
    answer("Express", message = "Express je JavaScript knjižnica."),
    answer("Shiny", correct = TRUE),
    answer("Angular"),
    allow_retry = TRUE,
    incorrect = "Odgovor ni pravilen.",
    correct = "Odgovor je pravilen."
  ),
  question(sprintf("Če je $x = %s$, katera trditev drzi?", x),
    answer(sprintf("$\\sqrt{x ^ 2} = 10$"), correct = TRUE, message = "Pravilen odgovor."),
    answer(sprintf("$x ^ 2 = %d$", x * 2)),
    answer("$\\sin x = 1$"),
    allow_retry = TRUE,
    random_answer_order = TRUE,
    type = "single"
  )
)
```

### Interaktivne Shiny komponente
```{r, echo=FALSE}
sliderInput("bins", "Number of bins:", min = 1, max = 50, value = 30)
plotOutput("distPlot1") 
```

```{r, context="server"}
output$distPlot1 <- renderPlot({
  x <- faithful[, 2]  # Old Faithful Geyser data
  bins <- seq(min(x), max(x), length.out = input$bins + 1)
  hist(x, breaks = bins, col = 'darkgray', border = 'white')
})
```



```{r filter, exercise=TRUE}
# filter the flights table to include only United and American flights
flights
```

```{r filter-hint-1}
filter(flights, ...)
```

```{r filter-hint-2}
filter(flights, UniqueCarrier=="AA")
```

